channel.title: Having trouble with evilginx2, need help
channel.description:
hi,everyone.I need your help. I used evilginx to build the Phishing platform for the Red-Blue exercise. https://github.com/kgretzky/evilginx2 By checking the online articles: https://cilynx.com/how-to/evilginx2-vs-2fa-phishing/424/ , I first applied for a godaddy domain name mucfc-com.store ,Then use certbot certonly -d "mail.mucfc-com.store" -a manual --preferred-challenges dns --register-unsafely-without-email to request an SSL certificate, ![image|690x228](upload://yvOJYZ4hv26NMKLyfs39tbfR9YJ.png) this is my domain config : ![image|481x500](upload://aZ6aUS1qw4s2gh3XNYS6u2t4Esu.png)
this is evilginx2 config: ![image|569x500](upload://uBqS4Sq0j0jjUCvjFzlzDwuaYs5.png)
But accessing the URL keeps reporting an error: WARN: Cannot handshake client mail.mucfc.com write tcp 172.21.x.x:443->x.x.x.x:38917: write: connection reset by peer
If you can help me, I would be very grateful :blush:

item.title: Having trouble with evilginx2, need help
item.dc:creator: pryoc110
item.description:
hi,everyone.I need your help.
I used evilginx to build the Phishing platform for the Red-Blue exercise.

GitHub

GitHub - kgretzky/evilginx2: Standalone man-in-the-middle attack framework...

Standalone man-in-the-middle attack framework used for phishing login credentials along with session cookies, allowing for the bypass of 2-factor authentication - GitHub - kgretzky/evilginx2: Stand...

By checking the online articles: https://cilynx.com/how-to/evilginx2-vs-2fa-phishing/424/ , I first applied for a godaddy domain name mucfc-com.store ,Then use certbot certonly -d “mail.mucfc-com.store” -a manual --preferred-challenges dns --register-unsafely-without-email to request an SSL certificate,


this is my domain config :

this is evilginx2 config:

But accessing the URL keeps reporting an error: WARN: Cannot handshake client mail.mucfc.com write tcp 172.21.x.x:443->x.x.x.x:38917: write: connection reset by peer

If you can help me, I would be very grateful

Read full topic
